overview: A tomato is planted, harvested and sold at a supermarket, but it rots and ends up in the trash. But it doesn’t end there: Isle of Flowers follows it up until its real end, among animals, trash, women and children. And then the difference between tomatoes, pigs and human beings becomes clear.

production_companies.name: Casa de Cinema de Porto Alegre

tagline: A place where there are very few flowers.
title: Isle of Flowers
